p: In this study, we have identified that the components in the formulation based-chitosan combined with nanoparticles of chitosan and propolis, and extract of propolis, at the highest concentration of 40%, exerted a notable inhibition on the spore germination and principally, on the aflatoxin production of A.Â flavus. Nevertheless, since these results are under carefully controlled conditions, further research should be extended to in vivo proposal on different agricultural commodities affected by this fungus.
